meanings.definition: excessively concerned with material possessions or wealth
meanings.sent1: She always wanted the latest gadgets and designer clothes, showing her materialistic nature.
meanings.sent2: John's materialistic tendencies led him to prioritize money over relationships.
meanings.sent3: The materialistic cat only played with expensive toys, ignoring the simple ones.
meanings.sent4: Her materialistic mindset built a wall between her and true happiness.
meanings.sent5: The materialistic lifestyle left him feeling empty and unfulfilled.

meanings.definition: adhering to a philosophy that regards matter as the only reality
meanings.sent1: The materialistic view of the world focuses solely on physical existence.
meanings.sent2: Their materialistic beliefs reject the idea of a spiritual realm.
meanings.sent3: In the materialistic universe, only tangible things hold value.
meanings.sent4: His materialistic perspective limited his understanding of abstract concepts.
meanings.sent5: The materialistic philosophy reduces everything to mere physicality.
